amendment.description: Amendment raises the cap of revenue shared among the Gulf States who produce energy on the Outer Continental Shelf between FY 2023 and FY 2055 from $500 million to $750 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 112-540 to raise the cap of revenue shared among the Gulf States who produce energy on the Outer Continental Shelf starting in FY2023 from $500 million to $750 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Landry amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 244 - 173 (Roll no. 401).
